ValidationRule.description: To prevent users from pasting URLs that get cut off after 255 characters. Triggers at 255 characters (assuming the intended URL is larger).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( LEN( Final_PDF_URL__c ) = 255 /*Final PDF URL*/ || LEN( Kick_off_Meeting_Agenda_Doc__c ) = 255 /*Kick-off Meeting Agenda Doc*/ || LEN( Kick_off_Meeting_MP4__c ) = 255 /*Kick-off Meeting MP4*/ || LEN( MP4_Link__c ) = 255 /*MP4 Link*/ || LEN( Client_Wishlist__c ) = 255 /*Client Wishlist*/ || LEN( Panel_Questions__c ) = 255 /*Panel Questions*/ || LEN( Sponsored_Article_Govtech_URL__c ) = 255 /*Sponsored Article Govtech URL*/ || LEN( Recorded_Interview_Folder__c ) = 255 /*Recorded Interview Folder*/ || LEN( Govtech_URL__c ) = 255 /*Govtech URL*/ || LEN( Publisher_Email_Doc__c ) = 255 /*Publisher Email Doc*/ || LEN(Final_Delivery_Email_Link__c) = 255 /* Final Delivery Email Link*/ || LEN(Final_Lead_Report__c) = 255 /* Final Lead Report*/ || LEN(Topline_Report_URL__c) = 255 /* Topline Report URL*/ || LEN(Sponsored_Article_Internal_URL__c) = 255 /* Sponsored Article Internal URL*/ || LEN( Social_Media_Kit_URL__c ) = 255 /*Social Media Kit URL*/ ) && Id <> "a0M5Y00000dtHkHUAU" /*Temp will remove once this record is fixed*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A URL exceeds 255 characters. For SharePoint links, use the Share link instead of the browser URL. Email salesforce@erepublic.com for help.
